description: This file defines a React functional component 'NoteEditor' that provides an interface for editing, saving, and deleting notes. It manages local state for the note's title and content, and communicates with parent components via callback functions. The component includes UI controls like input fields and buttons, and handles asynchronous save/delete operations with loading states.

methods.name: NoteEditor
methods.description: React functional component for editing a note with save and delete functionality.
